sections.title: Description
sections.content: Wife and sister of Zeus, Hera rules as Queen of Olympus and protector of marriage, women, and childbirth. Though her mythology is dominated by Zeus's infidelities and her vengeful responses, she represents the sacred institution of marriage and the sovereignty of divine queenship.
